title: A Stroll in the Forest
greeting: Welcome to A Stroll in the Forest!
creator: Nathan Kunicki

clearing.description: As you open your eyes, you discover yourself surrounded by trees. You have a thumping headache and can't remember what happened before you passed out.

river.description: As you walk, you stumble across a small river. Despite it's size, you can see it's flowing quite rapidly and looks quite dangerous. Looking around, you can also see an underground hatch. It looks like it's been closed for decades.

hatch.description:
The entrance way to the hatch is dark and damp. It's hard to see what's around, but you can make out a couple of doorways - one to the west and one to the east.

You can just see the outline of a torch on the wall, though it isn't lit.

stick.description: A stick that's clearly broken off a tree.

torch.description: A wooden torch. It's not lit. Perhaps you should light it.
